metadata.title: CVE-2024-53106 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ima: fix buffer overrun in ima_eventdigest_init_common  Function ima_eventdigest_init() calls ima_eventdigest_init_common() with HASH_ALGO__LAST which is then used to access the array hash_digest_size[] leading to buffer overrun. Have a conditional statement to handle this.
